TopicTitle: Need your own thread moved or locked? Post here.

Articles.Content: Closed them both, shame no one else contributed to your 3D art thread Slam_Jones.

Are you sure Norpo? Just because one guy crapped on your thread doesn't mean it's a bad thread, I can remove his posts and let you start again if you like.

It's alright; I actually found some good requests in the forums to keep me busy, probably don't want to have to juggle both at the same time.

(yes i'm absolutely sure)

EDIT Just realized they were both closed; thanks!

Need help here, I made a thread that had been made before... Darn.

I need help closing it.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107396-Showcase-The-Satellite-Showcase-thread-Close-please%21?p=1671632#post1671632

Thanks!
Closed it for you

Closed it for you

Oh wow, thanks! That was super fast, have some rep!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107697-Destroy-Green-Iron-Crown%21/page26

Either this should be closed or moved somewhere else.

Addendun to the closed topic in question:

Now you see why your truly doesn't like the rep bar? Even moderators don't care and violate the rules.

We care very much, not that you would believe that, we care about keeping these forums a friendly and fun place where people can come and discuss KSP and science with like minded people, where they can have a bit of fun and let their hair down from time to time.

What we don't care about are people who try to upset others deliberately, who troll, who fight and cause others to have to tread on eggshells in any thread those kind of people decide they want to derail today.

There's plenty of sites where that happens, and members don't like it, that's why we need moderators.

The thread you linked to is not harming anyone, people are having fun in a non-trolling, non-aggressive fashion, you're welcome to join in and who knows, you may get a few rep points yourself.

Depends on how you play along

Tell that to KasperVld or either remove the WNTP thread then:

The General Discussion forum is meant for any KSP-related discussion that does not fit in other sections of the forums. This means that:

  • Tutorials go in the Tutorials forum.
  • KSP related videos and streams go in the Live from Mission Control! forum.
  • Threads for rocket building 'companies' go in the Rocket Builders forum.
  • Reports and showcases of missions go in the Mission Reports forum.

Aside from those topics we see a lot of threads related to gameplay questions, which should go to the How To forum, people who want to share their spacecraft should go to the Spacecraft Exchange forum and non KSP related videos and streams go in the Off Topic forum.

It's good to see that moderation violates their own rules when it serves their own interests.
There is of course no discussing this with you, the thread stays until Green Iron Crown is reduced to zero reputation, have fun
